alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Boyd; Brown; Custer; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 13 at 2:06PM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, ground blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on near zero visibility and near impossible travel through early evening. Winds will diminish somewhat this evening which will improve visibility some. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
